{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=Nexus Player |revision=(TV500I) |asin= |fcc_date=10/19/2014 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |type=media player, set top box |fcc_id=MSQ-TV500I |ic_id=3568A-TV500I |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=Z3560 |cpu1_cspeed=1.8 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=8 GiB |fla1_brand=Toshiba |fla1_model=THGBMBG6D1KBAIL <!-- eMMC;THGBMFG6C1LBAIL; --> |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=DDR3 <!-- ;H5AN4G6NAFR; --> |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4354 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Multimedia Chip;ITE Tech;IT8566E;;1; ,,, PMIC Chip;Intel;PMB6830;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 4.1 LE, HDMI out, Remote with voice search, |stock_os=Android TV;8.0;Android 5.0 (Lollipop); |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui= }} {{TagLine|ASUS Nexus Player}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.asus.com/us/Home-Entertainment/Nexus_Player/}}
*[http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA56695 WFA56695] (2014-10-22) *[https://browser.geekbench.com/v4/cpu/2432359 Geekbench]
"TV500I REV.1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
